Text: Can a mod Please ban this guy..all his links go to spam pages..I would not care if there was no previews, but come on.
@ jaybayluv: Try getting Adblock or another popup blocker and it should take care of your spam. Worked for me.

You want to ban a guy who post great stuff, high quality just for a link? I don't care, I noticed too all his link go to a webpage. What is the purpose of that? Don't know. But I like what he shares here. So please, no ban.
